questions.question: 'They will publish the report next week.' → Passive voice?
options: The report will be published next week.
The report will publish next week.
The report is published next week.
The report has been published next week.

questions.question: 'Someone broke the window last night.' → Passive voice?
options: The window was broken last night.
The window is broken last night.
The window has broken last night.

questions.question: 'They are building a new bridge.' → Passive voice?
options: A new bridge is being built.
A new bridge has been built.

options: The package will be delivered tomorrow.
The package has been delivered tomorrow.

options: The computer was fixed last Friday.
